concept.title: Authentication
concept.shortdesc: StreamSets can authenticate user accounts based on files or LDAP. Best practice is to use LDAP if your organization has it. By default, uses file authentication.

conbody.p: authenticationData CollectorWhen you use file authentication, you can use Basic, Digest, or Form. Form is the default file authentication type.
To configure file authentication, edit the authentication realm.properties file for the authentication type. For example, to use Form, edit the form-realm.properties file.
The realm.properties files are in the following directory: <SDCinstalldir>/etc.
